h2_title: Purple Talisman Altars and the Supreme Inspector
content: You can find 4 Purple Talismans in the Webbed Hollow and Temple of the Yellow Flowers. Find them all to interact with a secret mini-boss for the chapter called Supreme Inspector and an additional character for your Journal.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md", within the section "Chapter 4 Secrets" and the sub-section "Purple Talisman Altars and the Supreme Inspector". The content is presented below:

You can find 4 Purple Talismans in the Webbed Hollow and Temple of the Yellow Flowers. Find them all to interact with a secret mini-boss for the chapter called Supreme Inspector and an additional character for your Journal.
